text: Abelardo is a male name with origins in the Spanish and Portuguese languages. It has been in use for many centuries and has a deep historical and cultural significance. The name comes from the Germanic name Abelard, which translates to "noble strength" or "resolute." == People == * Abelardo Fern√°ndez, Spanish footballer * Abelardo Montalvo, Acting President of Ecuador (1933 - 1934) ==References== Category:Names
title: Abelardo
